item.title: ‘Kidnapping of the Bride’ Director Sophia Mocorrea Preps ‘Vaca Muerta,’ Capturing a Fractured Society – in ‘Class, Origin and Generation’ (EXCLUSIVE)
item.description: LOCARNO, Switzerland — Sophia Mocorrea, writer-director of Sundance winning short “Kidnapping of the Bride” and awaited feature “Marriage by Abduction,” which scooped December’s Les Arcs Talent
